capabilities.label: Environmental Engineering Expertise
capabilities.definition: Ability to analyze groundwater data, assess contaminant risks, and prepare environmental reports
capabilities.evidence: Several years of experience, strong technical expertise
capabilities.application_in_case: Analysis of groundwater monitoring data for emerging contaminant
capabilities.source_text: Engineer A, an environmental engineer with several years of experience

capabilities.label: AI Tool Utilization
capabilities.definition: Ability to use AI software tools for drafting and content generation
capabilities.limitations: New to tool, unfamiliar with full functionality
capabilities.application_in_case: Used AI for report drafting and design document generation
capabilities.source_text: Engineer A opted to use open-sourced artificial intelligence (AI) software

capabilities.label: Content Verification
capabilities.definition: Ability to cross-check and verify accuracy of technical content against authoritative sources
capabilities.source_text: cross-checking key facts against professional journal articles and verifying the phrasing

capabilities.label: Document Sealing Authority
capabilities.definition: Legal authority to apply professional seal to engineering documents
capabilities.source_text: applied their seal consistent with state law

capabilities.label: Quality Assurance Review
capabilities.definition: Ability to review and refine technical documents for quality and accuracy
capabilities.status: No longer available due to retirement
capabilities.source_text: Engineer A had relied on guidance and quality assurance reviews by their mentor and supervisor, Engineer B

capabilities.label: Site-Specific Adaptation
capabilities.definition: Ability to modify designs to align with specific site conditions
capabilities.application_in_case: Adjusted AI-generated design elements for site-specific conditions
capabilities.source_text: adjusted certain elements to align with site-specific conditions
